Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/ Marquette
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temp rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 67th and California then resume their normal route on California

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 67th and California then resume their normal route on California due to police activity near California/ Marquette

Allow extra travel time.
